00012 #include <memory>

00045 template <typename T>
00046 class Singleton {
00047 protected:
00049     Singleton() {}
00050 
00051 public:
00054     virtual ~Singleton() {}
00055 
00058     static T* GetSingleton() {
00059         if (_instance.get() == NULL) {
00060             _instance.reset(new T());
00061         }
00062 
00063         return dynamic_cast<T*>(_instance.get());
00064     }
00065 
00066 protected:
00072     static std::auto_ptr<Singleton> _instance;
00073 
00074 };
00075 
00076 template <typename T>
00077 std::auto_ptr<Singleton<T> > Singleton<T>::_instance;
